beta

Instructions

Analyze your Flex Point usage & start spending smarter.

This is a tool to help you keep track of how quickly you're spending your Flex Points. Choose an option to see how it works, or, if you're a Notre Dame student, see your own results.

Quick

Enter current balance & press Enter

$

In-depth

Paste usage data (see below)

Error parsing data. Make sure there are lines of the form:

Flex Points	{{ $options.dayjs().format('MMMM D, YYYY, h:mmA') }}	C-Store 1	- $5.08

Just looking

Follow these quick instructions to see your own full personalized results.

  1. Click the link to log in to Irish1Card GET with your Notre Dame credentials.
  2. Under the "My Recent Transactions" header, {{ tabOption === 'mobile' ? 'tap' : 'click' }} "View All Transaction History."
  3. Making sure "ALL in the past 6 Months" is selected in the Month/Year dropdown, copy the entire table (or the entire page—it will sort it out for you). Note that copying large blocks of text on a mobile device can be difficult. A desktop or laptop computer is recommended for optimal exprience.
  4. Paste it into the text box below. (Don't worry, everything stays in your browser.)

Made with <3 by Stephen Hannon. See the code on GitHub. Have a bug report, suggestion, or comment? Leave feedback.

This app is not affiliated with the University of Notre Dame or CBORD.

The data you pasted doesn't go back to the beginning of the semester. Enter your current balance here and press Enter to get accurate results (a guess is fine).

Before now

  • {{ formatCurrencyOutput(rates.past && rates.past.perDay) }} per day
  • {{ formatCurrencyOutput(rates.past && rates.past.perWeek) }} per week

  • {{ formatCurrencyOutput(rates.future && rates.future.total) }} in total
  • {{ formatCurrencyOutput(rates.future && rates.future.perDay) }} per day
  • {{ formatCurrencyOutput(rates.future && rates.future.perWeek) }} per week
